name: Bigdance
overview: An action dance game put out by Edizione Logica 2000/Logica 2000 and published in Edizione Logica 2000 Supplementi #04 - Speciale n.01 - Squinzie, and also in Sfitinzie & Paninari 64 compilation. It would later be revisited in 2017 and subtitled Metalheads vs MadonnaGirls dance challenge.
